wifi.comment: Autoplay will only occur on wi-fi when the user selects this option

description.value: Autoplay videos begin automatically as you scroll. This can mean more data is being used, so choose when your videos should autoplay.

continue-tagging-session.comment: Alert Action to continue an ongoing taggin session

startOver.comment: Alert delete and start over an ongoing tagging session

someone.comment: Partial text when an ongoing tagging session was detected indicating the person who tagged the event was someone else

you.comment: Partial text when an ongoing tagging session was detected indicating the person who tagged the event was you

coach.comment: Partial text when an ongoing tagging session was detected indicating the person who tagged the event was some other coach

title.comment: Title for the alert when a game in progress is detected

body.value: Looks like {arg0} already started this game. Would you like to continue or start from the beginning?
body.comment: Message for the alert when a game in progress is detected

title.comment: Title in the Game Options Screen

halfTimeReport.comment: Title displayed at half time on top of the stats container

halfText.comment: Partial text indicating the half a soccer game is at

overtime.comment: Short for Over Time; i.e., a period beyond the 2nd half of a game

st.comment: Suffix indicanting it refers to the first ordinal number. Bear in mind this refers to a soccer half

nd.comment: Suffix indicanting it refers to the second ordinal number. Bear in mind this refers to a soccer half

rd.comment: Suffix indicanting it refers to the third ordinal number. Bear in mind this refers to a soccer half

th.comment: Suffix indicanting it refers to any other ordinal number different than 1st, 2nd or 3rd. Bear in mind this refers to a soccer half

message.value: Are you sure you want to end the half?
message.comment: Message displayed to confirm the user wants to end the current half

preGame.value: Tap Kickoff on the correct team to start the game

halfTime.value: Tap Kickoff on the correct team to start the half
halfTime.comment: Text displayed before continuing any half

kickoff.comment: Kickoff word. Important, when this is translated, the translation must be part of the strings with key: 'soccer.tagging.pre-game' and 'soccer.tagging.half-time (case sensitive)'

outOfPlayShort.comment: Text for the Out of Play button displayed only on iPhone tagging

saved.comment: Indicating that a shot was saved by the goalkeeper

offTarget.comment: Indicating that the ball went wide and out of bounds after a shot

blocked.comment: Indicating that some other player blocked a shot

in-preposition.comment: Just In proposition. Always shown as part of some other text

kick.comment: This doesn't mean kick as kicking something or someone and I don't believe this would go on its own ever but accompanying some of the other strings above. The differentiation is because there are some languages like Spanish where there are not 2 different words for Penalty, when a foul inside the box is committed, and Penalty Kick when the game is restarted by taking a shot from the penalty spot

gameOver.comment: Finish Game and Upload button text

title.comment: Indicating that live tagging is temporarily paused

keyMoment.comment: Text to be used only when 1 key moment has been tagged. A Key Moment is an undetermined action that a coach or some other member of the staff tagging, consider it relevant to be reviewed later

keyMoments.comment: Text to be used when more than 1 key moments have been tagged. A Key Moment is an undetermined action that a coach or some other member of the staff tagging, consider it relevant to be reviewed later

lastTagged.comment: Indicating when the last moment was created

attacking.comment: Indicating a group of moments in the game that imply an attacking opportunity

scorer.comment: Title displayed when tagging the scorer of a goal

assist.comment: Title displayed when tagging who assisted a goal

location.value: Where was the shot taken from?
location.comment: Title displayed when tagging where was the shot of a goal taken from

scorer.comment: Title displayed when tagging the scorer of a goal

assist.comment: Title displayed when tagging who assisted a goal

location.value: Where was the shot taken from?
location.comment: Title displayed when tagging where was the shot of a goal taken from

outcome.comment: Title displayed when the user needs to select one of the possible outcomes after tagging shot

assist.comment: Person who provides an assistance to someone who eventually scored

skip.comment: Text for the button to be displayed as the footer of a roster tableview

body.value: Adding your athletes to your team roster will allow you to track player stats for future games.

title.comment: Title of the tagged users modal view controller

invalidAsset.value: We were unable to download your video. Contact Hudl Support.
invalidAsset.comment: An internal error happened downloading an asset. Let the user know to contact Hudl about it.

networkError.value: We were unable to download your video.  You may want to check your internet before trying again.
networkError.comment: An asset download failed because there was a network error.

notEnoughAvailableStorage.value: We were unable to download your video.  You do not have enough space on your device.
notEnoughAvailableStorage.comment: An asset download failed because there was not enough free disk space on the device.

parseError.value: We were unable to download your video. Contact Hudl Support.
parseError.comment: An asset download failed because the manifest was invalid. Let the user know to contact Hudl about it.

diskError.value: We were unable to download your video. Contact Hudl Support.
diskError.comment: An asset download failed because there was an error with the local file system. Let the user know to contact Hudl about it.

unknown.value: We were unable to download your video. Please try again later.
unknown.comment: An asset download failed because of an unknown reason.

title.value: The highlight is rendering. Check back in a minute or two.

error.value: There was a problem loading this video.

clips.comment: Section title that contains a set of video clips

assignments.comment: Section title that contains a set of play assignments associated with the play card.

unnamed.comment: If there is not play card title in the data received, default to Untitled

all.comment: Title for a group of all plays associated with a plabook

offensive.comment: Title for a type of Playbook

defensive.comment: Title for a type of Playbook

specialTeams.comment: Title for a type of Playbook

playbookTitle.comment: Generic title for the summary playbook screen

installType.comment: Install type tile on summary screen

noAssignments.comment: The empty state value if no assignments are associated with the play card.

pluralPlays.comment: The number of plays the user has available to view.

singularPlays.comment: The number of plays the user has available to view.

gettingPlaybookSummaryAthlete.comment: Interstitial message displayed while requesting playbook summary.

gettingPlaybookSummaryCoach.comment: Interstitial message displayed while requesting playbook summary.

gettingPlaybookSummaryError.comment: Error text displayed when play book summary information could not be retrieved.

playbookPromptCoachPartOne.value: Our Playbook allows you to combine diagrams, video and assignments for in-depth game prep, week by week. It's part of the Play Tools bundle, available for an additional $199 a year.
playbookPromptCoachPartOne.comment: Prompt asking our coaches to call/email and sign up for a playtools subscription if they would like to have access to those features.

playbookPromptCoachPartTwo.value: To start your 14-day free trial or renew access to this feature, visit hudl.com. If you have any questions, feel free to email support@hudl.com.
playbookPromptCoachPartTwo.comment: Prompt asking our coaches to call/email and sign up for a playtools subscription if they would like to have access to those features.

playbookPromptAthletePartOne.value: Our Playbook allows you to see what plays you'll be running and what assignments you have week by week.
playbookPromptAthletePartOne.comment: Prompt asking our athletes to call/email and sign up for a playtools subscription if they would like to have access to those features.

playbookPromptAthletePartTwo.value: Your team's Playbook is currently disabled, ask your coach to start their trial or renew their subscription to access this feature.
playbookPromptAthletePartTwo.comment: Prompt asking our athletes to call/email and sign up for a playtools subscription if they would like to have access to those features.

playbookFetchingSharedInstalls.comment: Prompt telling our athletes we're fetching their install data.

playbookFetchingSharedInstallsErrorTitle.comment: Prompt telling our athletes we're fetching their install data error state title.

playbookFetchingSharedInstallsErrorBody.value: No installs have been shared with you currently. Only your coaches can share installs from the playbook.
playbookFetchingSharedInstallsErrorBody.comment: Prompt telling our athletes we're fetching their install data error state body.

logoutMessage.value: The user that recorded this video must log in to complete this upload
logoutMessage.comment: Message when a user taps on uploads by another user that has logged out.

alertTitle.comment: Alert title when attempting to play a deleted or no-longer-shared classic playlist.

alertMessage.value: It's likely the playlist was deleted or share settings have changed.
alertMessage.comment: Alert message when attempting to play a deleted or no-longer-shared classic playlist.
